Package scheduling.schedulingStrategies

Class SchedulingStrategyProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • scheduling.schedulingStrategies.SchedulingStrategyProvider

  • public class SchedulingStrategyProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used by the simulation core to retrieve new instances of DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy, which are used to schedule DR event windows. Thus, if the strategy that should be used is supposed to be changed, this should be changed in this class.
    Author:
    nilsw

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SchedulingStrategyProvider​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy getSchedulingStrategy​()
      Returns a new instance of DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy, that represents the strategy that should be used for the scheduling of DR event windows.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SchedulingStrategyProvider

    • Method Detail

      • getSchedulingStrategy

        public static DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy getSchedulingStrategy​()
        Returns a new instance of DemandFlexibilitySchedulingStrategy, that represents the strategy that should be used for the scheduling of DR event windows. Note that only the minimum and maximum frequencies.
        Returns:
        Scheduling strategy that is supposed to be used for the scheduling of DR events within the simulation framework.
